explains: adj. 寒冷的，严寒的；冷淡的

sentences.en: A snowstorm hit the West today, bringing with it frigid temperatures.
sentences.cn: 一场暴风雪今天袭击西部地区，带来了严寒低温。

sentences.en: Less solar energy is lost in evaporation at the frigid poles than in the tropics.
sentences.cn: 与热带地区相比，在寒冷的两极蒸发中损失的太阳能更少。

sentences.en: My husband says I am frigid.
